alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Sanpete Valley; Southwest Utah; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 3:55PM MST until December 15 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches along the valley floors, with 3 to 5 inches along the eastern benches. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern and southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...They heaviest snowfall is expected late Tuesday evening through Tuesday night, which will likely impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
